Title: Vaadin Platform possible file bypass via upload validation on the server-side
Description: When the Vaadin Upload's start listener is used to validate metadata about an incoming upload, it is possible to bypass the upload validation. Users of affected versions should apply the upgrade to a more recent Vaadin version.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 14.0.0 before 14.13.1, all versions starting from 23.0.0 before 23.6.2, all versions starting from 24.0.0 before 24.7.7
NotImpacted: All versions before 14.0.0, all versions starting from 14.13.1 before 23.0.0, all versions starting from 23.6.2 before 24.0.0, all versions starting from 24.7.7
